Rob Le Monds Violinist

Rob Le Monds began his Violin journey in middle school, 17 years ago at 11 years old, like many students do. As time went on, his passion for music and the Violin grew and began taking private lessons. Eventually, he became concertmaster of his High School Orchestra and the Philharmonic Youth Orchestra of San Antonio (YOSA). In 2010, Rob toured China with YOSA where they performed in Beijing, Shanghai, and Hong Kong alongside the Hong Kong Youth Symphony.

Schedule Consultation!

More about Rob

He is married to his beautiful wife Nichole and has two fur-babies. After joining the U.S. Navy, he was brought to San Diego to serve until the next adventure begins. While not a typical performer, he does have a passion for weddings and sharing his experience with others.
